title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. II, subch. F, art. 1, pt. 167 - INSTRUCTIONS-BALANCE SHEET ACCOUNTS
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. II, subch. F, art. 1, pt. 167 - INSTRUCTIONS-BALANCE SHEET ACCOUNTS
State Regulations
§ 167.1 - System of accounts prescribed
§ 167.2 - Records for territorial subdivisions
§ 167.3 - Work order and property record system required
§ 167.4 - Spreading of income, revenue, and expense items
§ 167.5 - Revenues from the distribution of electricity of others
§ 167.6 - Gains or losses from the settlement of asset retirement obligations
§ 167.7 to 167.9 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. II, subch. F, art. 1, pt. 167

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §
66[4]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
